pullRequest.title: [core] Deprecated Node#isFindBoundary for XPath
pullRequest.bodyText:
Refs #2218

Before submitting a PR, please check that:

 The PR is submitted against master. The PMD team will merge back to support branches as needed.
 ./mvnw clean verify passes. This will build and test PMD, execute PMD and checkstyle rules. Check this for more info

PR Description:

nodes.bodyText: Maybe we should place this in an internal package? This may change until 7.0

commit.message: Move DeprecatedAttribute annotation to internal package
